original: Lindström, Stig Thure Herman, redaktör, Karlshamn, f. 26/7/08 i Växjö av hovpred. Thure L. o. Ester Nordström. G. 40 m. Ingrid Westerlund. Barn: Mats f. 41, Kjell 43, Peter 47. — Fil. kand. i Lund 31. Medarb. i Eskilstuna-Kur. 32-35, i Blek. Dagbl 35-37 samt i Blek. Läns Tidn. sed. 37. Led. av polisndn 43, v. ordf. i konst-fören. 44, i kulturvårdsndn 46, verkst. led. av idr :platsstyr. 45, styr:led, i Riksteat. lokalavd. 39, i fornminnes-fören. 46, led. av kyrkofullm. 47, allt i Karlshamn. Resor t. Tyskl. 30 o. 36, Österr. o. Ung. 35, Finl. o. Balti-cum 38.
translated: Lindström, Stig Thure Herman, editor, Karlshamn, b. 26/7/08 in Växjö to court chaplain Thure L. and Ester Nordström. Married in 1940 to Ingrid Westerlund. Children: Mats b. 1941, Kjell b. 1943, Peter b. 1947. — Bachelor of Arts from Lund University in 1931. Collaborator at Eskilstuna-Kuriren from 1932 to 1935, at Blekinge Dagblad from 1935 to 1937, and at Blekinge Läns Tidning since 1937. Member of the police advisory board since 1943, vice-chairman of the art association in 1944, of the cultural preservation board in 1946, executive director of the sports authority in 1945, board member of the National Theatre local department since 1939, of the antiquarian society since 1946, member of the church council since 1947, all in Karlshamn. Traveled to Germany in 1930 and 1936, Austria and Hungary in 1935, Finland and the Baltic countries in 1938.
